Posts.Content: Jan 10, 2008 06:17AM Jenishouse wrote: Hi Girls, I'm on the other end with my rads.  Started in Nov. and have five more sessions to go(boosters).  I'm feeling really great.  Been able to work out and my skin's just  slightly red.  I highly recommend aloe vera gel massaged on radiation site after every tx.  My doc says that my skin has done exceptionally well...so maybe it's the aloe vera.  Anyways, now I get to start arimidex...which scares me. I never liked taking any kind of medicine ...was always into natural stuff.  Anyone else taking it?
Posts.Title: Anyone starting Rads in January? Barbie7 Miss_Lolli
